Feedback

SG Gaming is committed to improving our products, services and wider business support and we appreciate your feedback. Please use the form to send any comments you may have as a customer of SG Gaming. We read all feedback carefully and if you require a direct response to your feedback, please tick the box below.

Do you require a direct response from SG Gaming?

Please allow 5 working days for a member of our team to respond.

You will receive a copy of your feedback for your records. We appreciate all feedback and your Account Manager will be in touch accordingly to address your comments.
